Fact Check.info: This is info about Fact Check

Vooga.info: In a team of ten students, wrote a Java program to create a game authoring environment that allows users with no programming skills to build and play 2D video games.

Offline Map.info: Published an npm module that allows users to create and edit maps without any internet connectivity, instead using overlays of local images.

Code Quality.info: This is info about Code Quality

Slogo.info: In a team with three other students, provided an IDE (Integrated Development Environment) that supports users to write Logo programs. Mainly in charge of developing the API (Application Programming Interface) for the project.

Dots.info: Project for Duke Startup Challenge in a team with five other students. Designing a website that helps non-native English speakers to improve their language skills through pronunciation

Cell Society.info: In a team with three other students, wrote a Java program using JavaFX and reading in XML files that animates any 2D grid Cellular Automata simulation.
